name: 2GeeksinaLab
overview:
2GeeksinaLab has developed content protection designed to eliminate piracy (casual & professional) from physical media (CD, DVD, etc) as well as content downloaded via the Internet.

Global Gardeâ„¢ utilizes a multi-randomized, polymorphic quantum physics encoding approach to content protection (now thatâ€™s a mouthful!). In other words, Global Gardeâ„¢ is placed in multiple random locations and performs random multiple content verifications during installation and use of protected content.

Additionally, Global Gardeâ„¢ utilizes multiple (and randomly inserted) false logic, operations that go nowhere, logic bombs, dead ends, false information, and a myriad of self-checks designed to ensure that Global Gardeâ„¢ has not been tampered with or altered. 2Geeksinalab is currently marketing their product to various companies with a demo disc of their technology protected by their patent-pending protection process.

Global Gardeâ„¢ is content security that far surpasses any conventional protection in the market today that can be sold as a solution to the multi-Billion dollar problem of piracy within the commercial software and gaming companies represented by such well know companies as Microsoft, EA, and Computer Associates.

Global Gardeâ„¢ offers a solid solution to the multi-Billion dollar piracy issue that continues to wreak havoc on companies.

Established in 2004, 2GeeksinaLab, Inc. is a research and development company specializing in the creation of innovative computer software and hardware technologies and was funded almost entirely by the residents of the Antelope Valley, California.
